snippet: The news that Hostess has filed for bankruptcy protection has people talking about Twinkies.
abstract: The news that Hostess has filed for bankruptcy protection has people talking about Twinkies.
lead_paragraph: As Dealbook reported this morning, Hostess Brands, the baking company founded in 1930 that gave us Twinkies, Ding Dongs and Ho Hos, has filed for bankruptcy protection. Its treats have been by turns associated with a certain brand of sweet American sunshine, as well as the pitfalls of industrial food and the obesity epidemic that many have pegged to the increasing ubiquity of high-calorie snack foods.

headline.main: Twinkie's Troubles Inspire Some Sweet Memories
